title: Introduction
text:
Project Tasks

The project Tasks are as follows:

Explore the available literature
Obtain Pre-Merger Data
Obtain Post-Merger Data
Understand the Impacts of Primary School Merger on Accessibility
Identify Top Affected Areas
Propose potential on how to minimize impacts

title: G1T4: Travel So Long for What!
text:
We are a group for students taking SMT201. We wanted to explore the impacts of the merger of Singaporean educational institutes on students travel times.
Come take a look at our proposal!

title: Proposal
text:
Our Motivation


The merging of 2 schools is not always a happy occasion for many students. For some students, they often end up travelling for longer hours, leading to less time to relax and enjoy.
As SMU students, we wanted to explore the impact of the merger of educational institutions (i.e Primary and Secondary schools) to find out whether it is easier for students to access their schools after a merger.
Through our findings, we hope to provide recommendations on how the merger of schools can be improved in terms of ease of access, for students. We do this in the hopes of making their commute a more pleasant experience.



Scope of Work


Our team has decided to work on Primary schools in Singapore.



Project Schedule
